revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: To the sitologues of Karanis. I have got a written declaration for grain for this current year, the 17th year of the reign of Antoninus Caesar, the lord. (2nd hand (signature):) Petesouchos, son of Petesouchos, from Patsontis, holder of the 4th clerouchy with five arourai of royal land.

listBibl.bibl: P. Got. 2 Bell, H. I., The Classical Review, Vol. 43, No. 6, 1929, p. 237; Schmidt, Karl Fr. W., Philologische Wochenschrift 8, 50.
